faq_subtitle: Everything you need to know about our papercraft kits.
faq_a1: Every kit includes pre-cut paper sheets, a glue stick, and step-by-step instructions. No scissors or additional tools required.
faq_a2: We have three difficulty levels: Easy (perfect for beginners and kids), Medium (some experience helpful), and Hard (for experienced papercrafters). Each product page shows the difficulty rating.
faq_q3: How long does it take to complete a kit?
faq_a3: Completion time varies by kit complexity. Easy kits take 1-2 hours, Medium kits 2-3 hours, and Hard kits 3 to even 8 hours. Take your time and enjoy the process!
faq_q4: What age is appropriate for the kits?
faq_a4: Easy kits are suitable for ages 7+. Medium kits work well for ages 12+. Hard kits are recommended for teens and adults. Adult supervision is recommended for younger children.
faq_q5: Do I need glue or scissors?
faq_a5: Glue stick is included in every kit. No scissors neededâ€”all pieces are pre-cut and ready to punch out.
faq_q6: Can I return a kit if I don't like it?
faq_a6: Yes! We offer a 30-day return policy for unopened kits. See our Returns page for full details.

privacy_subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your information.

privacy_collect_desc: We collect information you provide when placing orders (name, email, shipping address, payment details) and automatically collected data (browser type, IP address, pages visited).

privacy_protect_desc: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data. Payment information is processed securely through our payment providers.
privacy_contact_desc: Contact us at contact@fold.club for any privacy-related questions.
